com.siperian.sif.message.metadata

Class MetaDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetaDataBatchGroup, MetaDataCleanseFunction, MetaDataColumnBase, MetaDataHmConfiguration, MetaDataHmHierarchy, MetaDataHmPackage, MetaDataHmProfile, MetaDataHmSandbox, MetaDataHmTypeBase, MetaDataMapping, MetaDataMatchColumn, MetaDataMatchPathComponent, MetaDataMatchRule, MetaDataMatchRuleSet, MetaDataParameter, MetaDataQuery, MetaDataQueryGroup, MetaDataRelationship, MetaDataRole, MetaDataSystem, MetaDataTable, MetaDataWorkflowEngine

    public class MetaDataBase
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable
    Represents properties that are common to all metadata. The MetaDataXXX objects that extend this class are used by the SIF Discovery APIs to represent metadata about objects in the repository.
    See Also:
    ListSiperianObjectsRequest, DescribeSiperianObjectRequest, Serialized Form

    API Group: Metadata

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Get the name of the Hub object represented by this metadata. The name is the internal name used to represent this Hub object and is typically not presented to the user.
        Returns:
        The name of the Hub object represented by this metadata.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Object o)
        Compares two MetaDataBase objects based on their UIDs
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable
        Parameters:
        o - The object to compare to this MetaDataBase object. This object should be a subclass of MetaDataBase or the method will throw a (@link ClassCastException).
        Returns:
        The result of the comparison.
        See Also:
        Comparable.compareTo(java.lang.Object)

      • findByUid

        public static MetaDataBase findByUid(String uid,
                                     Collection objects)
        Find the object with the specified UID in the specified collection of MetaDataBase objects.
        Parameters:
        uid - - UID of the object to be returned. If null, the return value is also null.
        objects - - Collection of MetaDataBase objects. Can be empty or null.
        Returns:
        First MetaDataBase object in the collection that matches the UID. Can be null.

      • getDisplayNames

        public static SortedSet getDisplayNames(Collection objects)
        Return a SortedSet containing display names from the the specified MetaDataBase objects.
        Parameters:
        objects - - Collection of MetaDataBase objects. Can be null or empty.
        Returns:
        A SortedSet containing display names (String objects) of MetaDataBase objects in the specified Collection. Can be empty but never null.

      • getPrivileges

        public ArrayList getPrivileges()
        Retrieve the privileges that the requesting user has on this Hub object. This is returned as a list of PrivilegeType objects.
        Returns:
        The list of PrivilegeType objects representing the privileges granted to the requesting user on this Hub object.

      • setPrivileges

        public void setPrivileges(ArrayList privileges)

        Parameters:
        privileges - The list of PrivilegeType objects representing the privileges granted to the requesting user on this Hub object.

        getPrivileges()
